testSteps.description: 1: Validate book creation with invalid price values ({name=Book A, author=Author A, publication=Publisher A, category=Fiction, pages=200, price=ABC})

children.description:

| name | author | publication | category | pages | price |
| Book A | Author A | Publisher A | Fiction | 200 | ABC |
When User submits the request to create a book
